name: Verdant Idea
summary:
Minecraft 1.20.1 Modpack.

The world as you know is gone. Your task is to bring it back to life!

Inspired by Regrowth, Verdant Idea is a unique experience in which you start in a vast, empty world and eventually build a thriving civilization using magic and technology.

While this modpack takes inspiration from Regrowth, treat it as a spiritual successor - there are many exiting changes and additions!
